attributes.title: Crashed!!
attributes.review: This app wouldn’t stop crashing my phone!! It gets so bad that my phone freezes, and the content is so out of date. Makes me hate using an iPhone

attributes.title: Terrible
attributes.review: It has many bugs, the layout is ugly, it takes up a tremendous amount of space on my phone, and took me hours to finally download.

I open this app and see a bunch of HORRIBLE photos. The were hateful, disgusting, horrifying pictures and some videos too. I was absolutely MORTIFIED and as I was going to delete the app I got a text... from the fbi. It said one of man kinds biggest mysteries has been solved. TRUMPS THE MAN BEHIND THE SLAUGHTER. NOT PURPLE GUY, ORANGE GUY🍊!!

attributes.title: Disappointed
attributes.review: This app is disgusting and I hate it when I downloaded it I had high hopes of the app giving some inspiration but all it gave was hate 0/10 would not recommend

attributes.title: damaged my phone
attributes.review: i’m not in what ever my generation is doing but i wanted to get the info yk. but ✨ T H E N ✨ my phone started crashing as soon as i opened the app like omg. some orange peel kept popping up and i literally barfed 🤮 i don’t want to see that... ever ever AGAIN

attributes.title: save barron ❤️✨🧚‍♀️
attributes.review: DO NOT GET THIS APP. this app is horrible. first, i got the app to support my nonracist, non-homophobic, non-sexist, non-rapist president. the app stole all of my information and hacked my phone. please don't get this app, unless you want to write a review ;). #genz #riptiktok #alttiktok #savebarron2020 #iputhashtagsinreviews

attributes.title: I hate him
